name: Unidentified_newscaster
content: A human worked as a newscaster on the planet Coruscant during the Imperial Era. In 5 BBY, this individual reported on the events of the Aldhani heist. In the reporting, observed by Syril Karn and his mother, several details were disclosed to the public such as multiple fatalities, the presence of a blockade, and an ongoing investigation into the perpetrators of the incident.
